price: ߓߘߎ ߝߍߕߐ߫ ߏ߬ ߟߏ߲ ߠߋ߬ ߸ ߏ߬ ߓߊ߯ ߞߍ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߘߌ߫ ߣߊ߬ ߓߌ߯
arabic: يَوۡمَ يُنفَخُ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَتَأۡتُونَ أَفۡوَاجٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: yawma yunfakhu fī al-ṣūri fatatūna afwājan
